title: Planted x Subway: Teriyaki Chicken Now Nationwide
excerpt: Our biggest partnership yet. planted.chicken Teriyaki is now available at Subway locations across Switzerland.
content: What happens when the world's largest sandwich chain teams up with Switzerland's most innovative plant-based meat company? Something delicious. The new Planted Teriyaki Sandwich features our signature planted.chicken, glazed in authentic teriyaki sauce, with fresh vegetables on freshly baked bread. Available now at participating Subway restaurants in Switzerland.
author: Planted Team
